Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.impl

Class DynamicEllipseEntity

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.core.YaegerGameObject
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.YaegerEntity
com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.ShapeEntity<javafx.scene.shape.Ellipse>
com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.CenteredShapeEntity<javafx.scene.shape.Ellipse>
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.impl.EllipseEntity
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.impl.DynamicEllipseEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContinuousRotatable, Rotatable, Effectable, Anchorable, Bounded, DragRepositoryAccessor, EventInitiator, GameNode, BufferedMovable, DirectionProvider, MotionModifier, Movable, SpeedProvider, Placeable, Removable, SceneChild, Initializable, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.DimensionsProvider, TimerListProvider, Updatable, UpdateDelegator
public abstract class DynamicEllipseEntity extends EllipseEntity implements UpdateDelegator, BufferedMovable, ContinuousRotatable
An DynamicEllipseEntity extends all behaviour of a EllipseEntity, but also implements the Updatable Interface.

  • Constructor Details

    • DynamicEllipseEntity

      protected DynamicEllipseEntity(Coordinate2D initialLocation)
      Create a new DynamicEllipseEntity on the given initialLocation.
      Parameters:
      initialLocation - the initial position at which this DynamicEllipseEntity should be placed

    • DynamicEllipseEntity

      protected DynamicEllipseEntity(Coordinate2D initialPosition, Size size)
      Create a new EllipseEntity on the given initialPosition with the given Size. Using this constructor results in the same situation as using DynamicEllipseEntity(Coordinate2D), EllipseEntity.setRadiusX(double) and EllipseEntity.setRadiusY(double), where both the Size.width() and Size.height() are divided by 2.
      Parameters:
      initialPosition - the initial position at which this DynamicEllipseEntity should be placed
      size - the Size of this DynamicEllipseEntity

    • setRotationSpeed

      public void setRotationSpeed(double rotationAngle)
      Description copied from interface: ContinuousRotatable
      Set the angle at which this YaegerEntity will bew rotated at each update. Note that a positive rotation value rotates the YaegerEntity counter clockwise, and a negative value rotates the YaegerEntity clockwise.
      Specified by:
      setRotationSpeed in interface ContinuousRotatable
      Parameters:
      rotationAngle - the angle as a double

    • getRotationSpeed

      public double getRotationSpeed()
      Description copied from interface: ContinuousRotatable

      Specified by:

      Returns:
      the rotation angle in degrees as a double

    • addToEntityCollection

      public void addToEntityCollection(EntityCollection collection)
      Description copied from class: YaegerEntity
      Add this YaegerEntity to the EntityCollection, which will make it part of the YaegerGame. Since an EntityCollection contains different lists of Entities, a YaegerEntity itself is responsible for knowing to which list it should be added.

      Note: This method is part of the internal API, and should not be used when implementing a Yaeger game.

      Overrides:
      addToEntityCollection in class YaegerEntity
      Parameters:
      collection - the EntityCollection to which this YaegerEntity should add itself
